tool_description: Validates currency codes against ISO 4217 standards and checks for active status and regional restrictions.

currency_codes.description: Array of currency codes to validate

check_active_status.description: Whether to check if currencies are currently active

error_messages: Empty currency codes: Provide at least one currency code to validate.
Invalid format: Currency codes must be 3-letter strings (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP).
Too many codes: Maximum 100 currency codes can be validated in one request.
usage: Provide an array of currency codes to validate. Optionally disable active status checking. Returns validation results for each currency code.

validation_results.description: Array of validation results in format 'CODE:STATUS:DESCRIPTION'

total_checked.description: Total number of currency codes checked
